title: Raise the bar with these electric beauty trends
text: Discover how to use vibrant colours through hair, makeup, and nails and make a fabulous statement. These electric beauty trends are totally wearable and can add a pop of colour to your day.Short defining strokes at the right places can add an interesting dimension to a regular makeup look. Set the base in a dewy finish. Highlight the waterline with an electric blue eyeliner, and extend the lines outwards for a dramatic effect. Keep the lids neutral, and bring on those falsies. Create a fruity pink pout, and define half of the upper and lower lip with blue pencil. Go in fora sleek ponytail to rock this look.
description: Colour shocks make for vibrant beauty looks that captivate and energise. Adopt these electric beauty trends for a splash of colour
